The Menu of the day is ordered until 15:00 pm

28 lei without dessert / 41 lei with dessert

Monday 

Yellow Beans Soup with Cashew Cream– vegan / gluten free / paper bio container / 330 ml (yellow bean, white onion, carrot, celery, tomato, cashew, olive oil, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Spinach with Tofu – vegan / gluten free / paper bio container / 300 g (spinach, tofu, red bell pepper, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Whole Wheat Bread – vegan / with gluten / 70 g (whole wheat, yeast, olive oil, himalayan salt)

or  gluten free option

Carrot Crackers Bread – raw / gluten free / 40 g (carrot, white sesame, tomato, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Cheesecake with Raspberry – raw / gluten free / 110 g (cashew, raspberry, cocoa butter, dates, vanilla, orange, lemon, curcuma, raisin, honey unfiltered)
